person.persName: Patrick Dillon (Louisville, Kentucky, tavernkeeper and city marshal)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, tavernkeeper and city marshal. Pennsylvania native. Married to Mary Keal Dillon in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on July 8, 1857. Father of Mary Dillon and Benjamin J. Dillon. Served in Atkinson's Company of the Kentucky Home Guards as 3rd Lieutenant in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1861. Tavernkeeper in partnership with Benjamin Pulford in Louisville from 1861 to 1862. Member of the Board of Aldermen in Louisville from 1863 to 1864. City marshal in Louisville from 1864 to 1865.
